[00:05.03]Alright, alright
[00:07.78]Alright, alright
[00:10.27]Alright, alright, it's a hell of a feeling though

[00:21.17]
[00:21.17]Who are these people?
[00:23.91]I just woke up in my underwear
[00:26.65]No liquor left on the shelf
[00:29.15]I should probably introduce myself
[00:31.60]You shoulda' seen what I wore

[00:36.87]I was the king of this hologram
[00:39.24]Where there's no such thing as getting out of hand
[00:42.10]Memories tend to just pop up
[00:44.63]Drunk pre-meds and some rubber gloves
[00:47.27]Five-thousand people with designer drugs
[00:49.81]Don't think I'll ever get enough (don't think I'll ever get enough)
[00:57.44]
[00:57.44]Champagne, cocaine, gasoline
[01:00.43]And most things in between
[01:03.03]I roam the city in a shopping cart
[01:05.57]A pack of camels and a smoke alarm
[01:08.11]
[01:08.11]This night is heating up
[01:11.01]Raise hell and turn it up
[01:12.82]Saying "If you go out you might pass out in a drain pipe"

[01:44.84]How did we end up in my neighbors pool
[01:47.18]Upside down with a perfect view?
[01:50.12]Bar to bar at the speed of sound
[01:52.46]Fancy feet dancing through this town
[01:55.16]Lost my mind in a wedding gown
[01:57.70]Don't think I'll ever get it now
[01:59.25](Don't think I'll ever get it now)
